article_metadata.description: VALPARAISO | The Affordable Care Act was on the minds of many of the residents who attended a town hall meeting with U.S. Rep. Pete Visclosky at Valparaiso City Hall
article_metadata.author:
SUSAN EMERY
Times Correspondent
